<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Greater Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=363)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Shadows that spend long amounts of time on the Shadow Plane and absorb its magic become greater shadows.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Greater Shadow](/Monsters.aspx?ID=363)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 289</row>

**Perception** +14; darkvision

**Languages**
[Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 75

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, precision, unconscious

**Resistances**
all 10 (except force, _ghost touch_, or positive; double resistance against non-magical)

**Weaknesses**
light vulnerability

**Light Vulnerability** An object shedding magical light (such as from the _light_ spell) is treated as magical when used to attack the shadow.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shadow hand +18 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d10+6 negative

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 25
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will)

**Shadow Spawn**   When a creature’s shadow is pulled free by Steal Shadow, it becomes a shadow spawn under the command of the greater shadow that created it. This shadow spawn doesn’t have Steal Shadow. If the creature the shadow spawn was pulled from dies, the shadow spawn becomes a full-fledged, autonomous shadow. If the creature recovers from its enfeeblement, its shadow returns to it and the shadow spawn is extinguished.

**Slink in Shadows**   The greater shadow can Hide or end its Sneak in a creature’s or object’s shadow.

**Steal Shadow** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirement** The greater shadow hit a living creature with a shadow hand Strike on its previous action. **Effect** The greater shadow pulls at the target’s shadow, making the creature [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (or [enfeebled 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) on a critical hit). This is cumulative with other [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) conditions from shadows, to a maximum of [enfeebled 4](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13). If this increases a creature’s [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) value to 3 or more, the target’s shadow is separated from its body (see shadow spawn). [Enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) from Steal Shadow decreases by 1 every hour.

</column>
